name: LunarOutpost
0:
”Alexa, launch Lunar Outpost”
”Alexa, open Lunar Outpost”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lunar outpost
des:
To utilize this app, you will need to own Ravensburger’s Lunar Outpost board game, available exclusively on Amazon. This app serves as Mission Control, taking the place of the Event cards and die in the board game. As Mission Control, Alexa will:

• Guide players through setup
• Allow players to choose what kind of outpost to build (or assign one randomly)
• Prompt players at the beginning and end of each round
• Narrate Events
• Track rounds, completed outpost modules, and end game conditions 

For questions or concerns on gameplay, please contact Ravensburger North America at service.us@ravensburger.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
